creator: emild@cs.technion.ac.il
text:
Trying to compile apr_iconv using the native (OS) iconv (i.e. defining
-DHAVE_ICONV in rules.mk) leads to compilation errors (re-definition of
apr_iconv_open()). I attach a patch to fix this problem.

creator: emild@cs.technion.ac.il
text:
Created attachment 8941
apr_iconv fix for native (OS) iconv implementation

Why on earth would you compile apr-iconv if you have a system iconv available?

  apr-iconv shouldn't be built in this case, apr-util should be detect the
  presence of system iconv and apr-util/xlate should directly use that api.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
